  1. #-*- coding: utf-8 -*-
  2. from django.http import HttpResponse
  3. from filer.server.backends.base import ServerBase
  6. class ApacheXSendfileServer(ServerBase):
  7. def serve(self, request, file_obj, **kwargs):
  8. response = HttpResponse()
  9. response['X-Sendfile'] = file_obj.path
  11. # This is needed for lighttpd, hopefully this will
  12. # not be needed after this is fixed:
  13. # http://redmine.lighttpd.net/issues/2076
  14. response['Content-Type'] = self.get_mimetype(file_obj.path)
  16. self.default_headers(request=request, response=response, file_obj=file_obj, **kwargs)
  17. return response
